description: Master Vue Components: Single File Components (SFCs), Props, Events, and Slots.

slides.title: Component Basics
slides.content:
# Reusable Instances üß±

Components are reusable Vue instances with a name.

They allow us to define custom elements:

```html
<button-counter></button-counter>
```
We can use the same component as many times as we want.

slides.title: Single File Components
slides.content: # .vue Files üìÑ Vue uses a dedicated file format (`.vue`) that encapsulates the Template, Logic, and Styles in one file. ```html ```

slides.title: Props
slides.content:
# Passing Data Down üéÅ

Props are custom attributes.

```javascript
// Child
props: ['title']
```

```html
<!-- Parent -->
<BlogPost title="My Journey with Vue" />
```
Use `:title="post.title"` to pass dynamic values.

slides.title: Emitting Events
slides.content:
# Sending Messages Up üì¢

Props go DOWN. Events go UP.

To communicate with a parent, the child emits an event.

```javascript
// Child
this.$emit('enlarge-text', 0.1)
```

```html
<!-- Parent -->
<blog-post @enlarge-text="onEnlargeText"></blog-post>
```

slides.title: Slots
slides.content:
# Slots üé∞

Slots allow you to pass specific content (HTML) into a component.

```html
<!-- Child Template -->
<button class="btn">
  <slot></slot> <!-- Content appears here -->
</button>

<!-- Parent Usage -->
<FancyButton> Click Me! </FancyButton>
```

slides.title: Named Slots
slides.content: # Multi-Slot Layouts üç± You can have multiple slots named `header`, `main`, `footer`. ```html ``` Shorthand for `v-slot:` is `#`. (e.g., `#header`).

slides.title: Dynamic Components
slides.content:
# Switching Components üîÄ

Use the special `<component>` tag to dynamically switch between components.

```html
<component :is="currentComponent"></component>
```
Combine with `<KeepAlive>` to cache the inactive component instances.

slides.title: Provide / Inject
slides.content:

Like React Context.

Instead of prop drilling through 5 layers:

1.  **Parent:** `provide: { user: 'John' }`
2.  **Great-Grandchild:** `inject: ['user']`

Summary
slides.content:
# Recap: Components üéì

Building Blocks.

- **.vue files:** Template + Script + Style.
- **Props:** Parent -> Child.
- **Emits:** Child -> Parent.
- **Slots:** Content Injection.
- **Provide/Inject:** Deep data passing.
